sentence.value: Gregory Hammond "Greg" Olsen (born April 20, 1945) is an American entrepreneur, engineer and scientist who, in October 2005, became the third private citizen to make a self-funded trip to the International Space Station with the company Space Adventures.

sentence.pattern_crowdsource: null

sentence.value: Dr. Olsen is a licensed Amateur Radio radio operator holding FCC callsign KC2ONX and spoke to students via ham radio from space through the ARISS project.

sentence.value: In an informal presentation at a New Jersey high school, Dr. Olsen estimated the price of his space excursion at US$20 million.
